# Data Cleaning
import library
```{r}
library(haven)
library(Statamarkdown)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
wave1 <- read_dta("a_indresp.dta")
filename <- c()
index <- c("a","b", "c", "d","e","f","g","h","i","j","k","l")
for (i in 1:length(index)){
  filename <- c(filename,paste0(index[i],"_indresp.dta"))
  assign(paste0("wave",i), read_dta(filename[i]))
}
varList <- c("sclfsato", "dvage", "fimngrs_dv", "jbstat", "marstat_dv", "health","nchresp", "gor_dv", "hhsize", "pidp", "hidp", "sex", "oprlg", "scend")
```

```{r}
allwaves <- c()
bgn <- c()
for (i in 1:12){
  allwaves <- list(allwaves, paste0("wave",i))
  bgn <- c(bgn,paste0(index,"_"))
  names(allwaves[[i]]) <- gsub(bgn[i], "", names(allwaves[[i]]))
}
for (i in 1:12){
  allwaves[i] <- allwaves[i] %>% select.list(all_of(var_names))
}
```
